XmlAllStopsParser - Class in com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.io
Parses a "allstops.xml" file generated by the Ottawa Travel Planner - OC Data stop analysis tool written by Michael Hurts.
XmlAllStopsParser() - Constructor for class com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.io.XmlAllStopsParser
Creates an instance of this class so that a stop database XML file may be parsed.

Parses the parameters used to start a service stored from a XML file.

Creates an instance of this class so that parameters for a service can be extracted from a XML file.
xmlParametersParser - Variable in class com.canabang.genietext.core.view.panels.parameters.ParametersPanel

Contains the constant properties and values that will be used when parsing and generating XML files.

XmlTagWriter(TransformerHandler, AttributesImpl) - Constructor for class com.canabang.genietext.core.model.io.xml.XmlTagWriter
